name: Heirloom: Kalabolg
description:
Heirloom: Kalabolg is a first person, grid-based, dungeon-crawling RPG, inspired by games such as Legend of Grimrock, Vaporum, Dungeon Master and the Eye of the Beholder series. It features real time combat, a labyrinthine dungeon to explore and many enemies to slay! Create your unique character and delve into the mysterious dungeon to find the famed sword Kalabolg, or die trying.

The game is still in development and you can try out our free demo. It contains the first two levels of the dungeon, four different enemies, three different armor sets, four weapons and your character can reach up to level five.

Control Sheme

W - Move Forward

S - Move back

A - Strafe Left

D - Strafe Right

Q - Turn left

E - Turn Right

Esc - Pause/Unpause Game

Mouse Left - Interact
